nodes.text: Kun's Blood was a lightsaber crystal found in the galaxy during the Galactic Civil War.

Kun's Blood first appeared in Star Wars Galaxies, a MMORPG released by Sony Online Entertainment in 2003. It was added to the game as part of the raid system in Hotfix 21.4. The crystal shares the name of Exar Kun, a Sith Lord alive during the days of the Old Sith Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, but the game does not establish any connection between the two.
